job_tasks.phrase: help train AI large language models
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly indicates the core activity of training AI models, specifically large language models.

job_tasks.phrase: helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the goal of the AI models being trained, which is a direct outcome of the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: engaging with these models as they learn to code
job_tasks.justification: This describes the hands-on interaction required for model training and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
job_tasks.justification: This elaborates on a specific method used to train the AI models, involving data generation through questions.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: This describes a crucial part of the model training lifecycle: evaluation and feedback for improvement.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
lend your coding expertise to train AI models

classification.rationale: The role focuses on training and improving generative AI models, specifically large language models, which aligns with the core definition of a GenAI Engineer. While it involves modeling tasks, the emphasis is on the application and refinement of generative AI rather than traditional predictive modeling or MLOps.
